title: NFL Monday Night Football average viewers 2015 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Viewers in millions, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 2015.
